name: Don't Explode, Run
description:
"Don't Explode, Run!" is a fast paced and chaotic action platformer set in a city that has become overrun by an enemy known as Bomb-Heads who have been infected by the “Explosion Virus” which courses them to explode if they get too close to humans. Run through the city and deliver parcels to safe houses to increase your score, try to see how fast you can do it too!

CONTROLS:

Jump = W

Move Left = A

Crouch = S

Move Right = D

Pickup Parcel/Deposit Parcel = SPACE

Charge Shield at computers = C

Pose 1 = NUMPAD1

Pose 2 = NUMPAD2

Pose 3 = NUMPAD3

Pose 4 = NUMPAD4
